wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Frederick Joseph Loftus-Tottenham, CBE, DSO and Bar (4 May 1898 – 11 April 1987) was a British Indian Army officer during World War I and World War II.

response: General Officer Commanding : Major General Frederick Joseph Loftus-Tottenham (as of 1 February 1944):
* Colonel (Temporary Major-General) Frederick Joseph Loftus-Tottenham, , Commander, Force 401, Iraq.
